basic.description: This course poses the question: How can we understand and respond to urban decay and decline? Using examples from the U.S. and abroad, students explore the differences between "conventional" urban poverty (which may be a necessary part of successful cities), systematic urban decline, new suburban poverty, favelas and shantytowns, etc. Students also examine recent strategies to "reclaim" failing cities.
basic.subject: IFS
basic.title: Dead Cities
